NewsArticle.Title: The Birdman's Missing Eggs
NewsArticle.Content:
Calling all Aislings!
Oh no! Pieydagnelle's eggs have disappeared from his nest! Will you help find them? All Aislings are invited to attend and help find the eggs!
- Fishfood (Suomi Troupe)
((This is a role playing event starting on 12/15 at 2PM PST at the Suomi Town Board. Details will be given shortly after the event begins.))
